name: Exeter
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

After an all-night, drug-fueled party at an abandoned asylum known for its horrific treatment of its patients, a group of ordinary teens decide to tinker with the occult, mysteriously leads to a violent possession. In an effort to find help, the group rushes to escape to only find themselves locked inside with no means of communication. Tempers flare, trust is broken and in attempt to save a teen, the amateurs attempt a DIY exorcism. Instead of solving the problem and unbeknownst to them, they unleash an even more powerful and vengeful spirit – one that has a distinct motive and wants them all dead. The teens need to solve this mystery and find an exit to save their lives. Their search for answers uncovers the asylum’s dark past and the terrible secrets that are harbored within its walls. What started as a harmless paranormal experiment turns into fast paced bloody paranormal nightmare with unexpected consequences.

In an effort to find help, the group rushes to escape to only find themselves locked inside with no means of communication. Tempers flare, trust is broken and in attempt to save a teen, the amateurs attempt a DIY exorcism. Instead of solving the problem and unbeknownst to them, they unleash an even more powerful and vengeful spirit – one that has a distinct motive and wants them all dead. The teens need to solve this mystery and find an exit to save their lives. Their search for answers uncovers the asylum’s dark past and the terrible secrets that are harbored within its walls. What started as a harmless paranormal experiment turns into fast paced bloody paranormal nightmare with unexpected consequences.
short_description: At an abandoned asylum, six teens tinker with the occult, causing a possession, paranormal mystery and a bloody nightmare that no one could predict. From the director of The Texas Chainsaw Massacre and producers of Paranormal Activity and Insidious.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
